questions.question: I felt emotionally stable and grounded this week.
I was able to manage my stress in healthy ways.
I felt comfortable expressing my thoughts and feelings in our sessions.
I was able to reflect on my emotions and behaviors effectively.
I noticed positive changes in how I relate to myself.
I applied tools or insights from therapy in my daily life.
I felt supported and understood during our recent sessions.
I was able to cope with challenges without feeling overwhelmed.
I maintained a healthy routine and took care of my basic needs.
I felt a sense of progress in my personal growth or healing journey.
